players.name: Alice
memory: You: "This is terrible! Diana was killed on the first night. We need to figure out who the mafioso is among us three remaining players."
Bob: "Let's stay calm and focus on gathering information. We need to identify the mafioso among us. I believe that open communication will help us make an informed decision."
You: "I think we should be very careful about who seems too eager to direct the conversation. The mafioso might try to appear helpful while steering us away from the truth."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Alice
